more_content:
If you’re in Key West for the 4th of July, make sure to check out our 1st Annual 4th of July Stars & Slides Party at our onsite, outdoor event space, the Sunset Green Event Lawn.

Complete with inflatable water slides, live music, a pig roast, a foam party, games for kids and drinks, the event is free and will run 1-4 on Independence Day, giving you ample time to get down to Higgs Beach to enjoy the evening fireworks.

Don’t forget - the days leading up to the 4th of July the Conch Republic plays host to the Annual Key Lime Festival, one of the sweetest events of the year. Activities include a pie drop, pie hop, Key lime cocktail sip and stroll, and the famed pie eating contest. The festival begins June 30 and ends on Independence Day with an evening of fireworks near the southernmost point of the island.

Joining our 4th of July celebration at the Sunset Green Event Lawn is the best way to kick bag and enjoy the national holiday the way it should be -- with a daytime barbecue and cold drinks. Bring the flip-flops and we’ll provide the rest, including our airstream liquor bar and BBQ menu items.

Aside from parties and a planned concert series, our Sunset Green Event Lawn is a 12,105-square-foot outdoor landscape designed to host weddings, concerts, family reunions, special events, movie nights and more, with a capacity of up to 1,200 guests. Guests who rent the space have flexibility to make it their own with amenities, including but not limited to tents, dance floors, portable air conditioning units and more.

Interested in more information to host your special event? We’ll work with you. Check the contact information on our event page, or call the sales office at (305) 600-1425

---

Book your hotel stay in advance at 24 North Hotel, located in New Town. Find the best fares only available on our website, www.24northhotel.com.
